channel.title: Posts on A Site For Myself!
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on A Site For Myself!

item.title: First_Test_Post
item.description: CREATE DATABASE wordpress; GRANT ALL ON wordpress.* TO ‘colter’@’localhost’ IDENTIFIED BY ‘vi7q5knjynf’ WITH GRANT OPTION; mariadb -u colter -p sudo mkdir /var/www/rubehickscube.com sudo chown -R $USER:$USER /var/www/rubehickscube.com sudo nano /etc/nginx/sites-available/rubehickscube.com server { listen 80; listen [::]:80; root /var/www/rubehickscube.com; index index.php index.html index.htm; server_name rubehickscube.com; location / { try_files $uri $uri/ =404; } location ~ \.php$ { include snippets/fastcgi-php.conf; fastcgi_pass unix:/var/run/php/php7.3-fpm.sock; } } sudo ln -s /etc/nginx/sites-available/rubehickscube.com /etc/nginx/sites-enabled/ mariadb -u colter -p
